name: Friday Night funkin clay mod
description:
the source code is part of phykro: https://phykro.itch.io/fonedin original mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/download/186935 imnotluis38 helped me with the menu characters and icongrid! His page: https://imnotluis38.itch.io

v0.0.2: fixed the menu characters and icongrid! Credits to you imnotluis38, and fixed the black screen bug on week 6 storymode on thorns cutscene!
